name: Temporary File
summary: Learn about .$$$ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Programs that support $$$ files typically generate them automatically and then delete them when the program closes appropriately. However, in some cases, $$$ files remain in the system and require manual removal. If you find a $$$ file, check the software that created it before deleting it to avoid losing important data.

instructions: $$$ files are not meant to be opened by a user. Instead, the program that generated it references the file to safeguard against losing the original file.
If you need to open a $$$ file, you may be able to open and view its contents with a text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows) and Apple TextEdit (macOS), if it stores plain text.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
